entry.title: Mersing Penyabong Beach
entry.content:
Things to Do

  • Star gazing
  • Fresh cheap seafood - endau, mersing
  • Beach hopping - mawar (bring insect repallent, nasty sandfly!), air papan, resang
  • Photographing - paddy field, sun rise, stars, cows and sheeps
  • Trekking - gunung arong
  • Meteorology Station

Stay

  • Endau Beach Resort
  • other 2
  • more in air papan, mawar

How to Get There?

Location Map

Local Tips

  • Secret beaches - mawar, enough water, umbrella, sunblock
  • Drive with care - cows, sheeps, cubs
  • Low tide - stop by Mawar
  • Apply insect repallent
  • Bring torch light
  • Star gazing in front Endau Beach Resort, safer
  • Ask for direction - friendly and helpful locals
  • Eat at Endau (during Ramadan)
  • Endau Beach resort - Ask for water heater
  • Paddy field at Air Papan
